messages.title: Taking Pride in Our Lakes
messages.content: Thanks to relentless pressure from local community campaigner Judith Grajewski, supported by local Conservative Councillors Judith and Nick, the eyesore that is the lakes behind Malcolm Close has finally begun to be cleaned up and fenced off.

messages.title: Give Us Back Our Allotments
messages.content: Conservative candidate John Caldwell is calling on the Borough Council to replace the allotment site on the land behind Malmesbury Lawn in Chandlers Ford.

messages.title: 2010 ... Year for Change
messages.content: Local campaigner Judith Grajewski, pictured right, has had enough of increased spending in the face of public services declining. She is calling for a change as 2010 approaches.

messages.title: Help Steve Brine & The Conservatives Today
messages.content: If you would be happy to help us, please complete your details below.

messages.title: We Need a Conservative MP Locally To Change The Government

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Efforts to clean up and maintain local lakes and allotments.
Criticism of increased council spending and call for more efficient use of resources.
Prevention of unsolicited calls and improving safety measures.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Conservatives can beat Gordon Brown in a General Election

issues.environment: Efforts to clean up and maintain local lakes and green spaces.
issues.government: The need for a Conservative MP locally to change the national government.

community.content: Maintaining local lakes, replacing allotments, and community safety.
